com.adobe.aemfd.watchfolder.service.api

Interface ProcessorContext

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    WorkflowContext

    public interface ProcessorContext
    Context for service-based file processing, which supplies the watch-folder inputs and configuration parameters, and acts as a placeholder for the outputs to be written out to the results sub-folder of the watch-folder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Object> getConfigParameters()
      Returns an immutable map representing the watch-folder configuration parameters.
      Map<String,Document> getInputMap()
      Returns an immutable map representing the watch-folder input.
      String getWatchFolderId()
      Returns the ID of the watch-folder whose inputs are being processed.
      void setResult(String fileName, Document contents)
      Adds a result which will be written out as a physical file into the results folder of the watch-folder.

    • Method Detail

      • getWatchFolderId

        String getWatchFolderId()
        Returns the ID of the watch-folder whose inputs are being processed.
        Returns:
        The ID of the watch-folder whose inputs are being processed.

      • getInputMap

        Map<String,Document> getInputMap()
        Returns an immutable map representing the watch-folder input. The key is the name of the physical file, while the value is a Document representing the file contents.
        If the input placed into the top-level inputs folder of the watch-folder was a file, the input map will contain at most one entry (provided the file passed the watch-folder filter checks). If the input was a sub-folder, the map may contain multiple entries, one for each file within the sub-folder which passed the filter checks.
        Returns:
        An immutable map representing the watch-folder input.

      • getConfigParameters

        Map<String,Object> getConfigParameters()
        Returns an immutable map representing the watch-folder configuration parameters. The key is the name of the parameter, while the value is the parameter value of the correct type. For multi-valued parameters, the value is an array of the correct type.
        Returns:
        An immutable map representing the watch-folder configuration parameters.

      • setResult

        void setResult(String fileName,
               Document contents)
        Adds a result which will be written out as a physical file into the results folder of the watch-folder.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the output file. This is used as the name of the physical output file only if the output-file-pattern of the watch-folder is a folder pattern. If the output-file-pattern is a file pattern, this is ignored.
        contents - The contents of the output file. Must not be null.
